successes.title: Enemy of Man - Feature Film
successes.description: An independent feature film of William Shakespeare’s Macbeth starring Sean Bean, Rupert Grint and Charles Dance.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU - A massive THANK YOU from the EoM team for supporting us!  As well as a personalized digital thank you postcard, exclusive access to the updates and behind the scenes news during the production. ALL PLEDGES AT A HIGHER LEVEL WILL ALSO RECEIVE THIS!

THE INSTRUMENTS OF DARKNESS - An HD copy of our proof of concept short film. Exclusive to Kickstarter backers only for the first month! Be the first to see it!  ALL PLEDGES AT A HIGHER LEVEL WILL ALSO RECEIVE THIS!

FILM AND SCRIPT - A digital copy of the script with an intro and notes by Vincent on the process of adapting Shakespeare's greatest tragedy for the big screen. + A DIGITAL COPY OF THE FINAL FEATURE FILM, ENEMY OF MAN - ALL PLEDGES AT A HIGHER LEVEL WILL ALSO RECEIVE THIS!
FILM & DIGITAL BUNDLE - Get everything in the Film & Script reward AND an exclusive digital book of artwork and postcards PLUS the soundtrack! All pledges at a higher level will also receive this.
DVD or BLURAY of the proof of concept short film - Grab yourself a copy of The Instruments of Darkness on your choice of DVD or Bluray signed by the director.

DVD or BLURAY of the proof of concept short film plus a set of EXCLUSIVE POSTCARDS - Grab yourself a copy of The Instruments of Darkness on your choice of DVD or Bluray - signed by the director +  a set of five postcards with original Enemy of Man artwork.
EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT - Be the envy of your friends! Wear your support with pride with this exclusive Enemy of Man t-shirt. Only available through Kickstarter.
LIMITED EDITION POSTER - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - An exclusive poster limited to the number of Kickstarter backers, signed and numbered by the artist.
ADD ON $200 and have the poster signed by the entire cast.
LIMITED EDITION POSTER - An exclusive poster limited to the number of Kickstarter backers, signed and numbered by the artist.
ADD ON $200 and have the poster signed by the entire cast.
SIGNED SCRIPT - A copy of the final shooting script signed by the director.
STORYBOARDS - An original storyboard page by acclaimed storyboard artist Temple Clarke. Signed by Temple Clarke and Vincent Regan.
FUNDING PRODUCER - EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Become a funding producer! Have your name appear in the film credits as well as on IMDB.
FUNDING PRODUCER - Become a funding producer! Have your name appear in the film credits as well as on IMDB.

SPECIAL LIMITED EDITION POSTER - This is your chance to get your hands on an Extra Special limited edition variant Enemy of Man poster. It will be signed and numbered by the artist as well as the director. Don't miss out, once these are gone, they are gone forever! You'll also get the Funding Producer reward
ADD ON $200 and have the poster signed by the entire cast.
CONCEPT ART - Grab yourself a piece of cinema history and get an original piece of concept art from the film signed by the artist. On top of that you'll also get the Funding Producer reward.
ARMOUR - Own a one of a kind piece of armour designed by the legendary armourer Terry English. You'll also receive the Funding Producer credit.
SWORD - Designed by world famous armourer Terry English, exclusively for Enemy of Man, your very own hand crafted sword. Plus you’ll also receive the Funding Producer credit reward.

SET VISIT & PICTURE WITH THE CAST - Attend the shoot and have your picture taken with the cast on the shoot that day. Travel to set and accommodation are not included but breakfast and lunch on set will be! You’ll also receive the funding producer reward. All pledges at a higher level will also receive this.

SET VISIT WITH PREMIERE TICKETS - When they are gone, they are gone! - Includes everything at the $2500 level plus 2 x Premiere tickets to the screening of Enemy of Man. You’ll also receive the funding producer reward. All pledges at a higher level will also receive this.
ASSOCIATE PRODUCER - Become an associate producer on a feature film! Have your name appear in the film credits as well as on IMDB. Plus you'll get all other non-limited rewards and a set visit.
